alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 24 at 4:22AM EDT until March 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. The strongest winds will occur from 8 am through 3 pm Saturday, then again after 8 pm on Saturday night as winds shift to the southwest. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Southern Erie counties. The strongest winds Saturday and Saturday night will occur near the Lake Erie shoreline. Winds will not be as strong farther inland. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, including on I-90, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
